data.message: Mark, I would hate to be in your position, in which having to be everyday getting stupid comments on your website from silicone, botox, bleached bimbos and hicks from northern Canada writing things like "Mark I watched your movie man, you're so ballin." Yet they do not even know the physics into the world you have created online. Some people just do not understand you, and it just peeves me to see this, when you could meet an intellectual being like myself. I wish for us to meet. My name is Miriam Pearl Rose Roth. I am from Toronto, Ontario. Please facebook me. Good day.
